SUB_W07_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Oceans and volcanoes, prairies and forests...
This here world's a sample platter of
everything nature's got to offer!

SUB_W07_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
It certainly is. But we have a job to do,
and that takes precedence over sightseeing.

SUB_W07_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Hate that we gotta ignore all this beauty
for the sake of some weird triangle,
but suppose there ain't no other option.
Best saddle up and move out, then.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
These appear to be ruins of some sort—
and from the looks of it, they weren't
destroyed naturally.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Lower your piece, darlin'! Always better to
start with a few friendly questions before
you start throwin' lead around.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Howdy, pardner! You live around here?
Also, why're you wearin' a paper bag? ...Pardner? Do you not understand me?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text: We have visitors at the Soul Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Flamewave League spies, perhaps?
I've not seen their like before.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
As if we would recruit such
ostentatious agents!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
The Soul Temple has been the site of strange
phenomena since ancient times. Is that not
why we banded together to destroy it?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Are you suggesting these creatures are
Soul Voyagers? Are we to be ruled
by the Soul Temple even now?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
If they are indeed Soul Voyagers,
we of the Flamewave League will
not engage with them.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
And nor will we of the
Forestgale Alliance.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, crud. It ain't ever a great sign
when you're already a pariah five
minutes after settin' foot in a place.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_SOULCULTIST_000_CUT_00.text:
That's overstating things a bit;
this fellow right here seems to
like us just fine. Thanks for showing us around,
little ghost.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
This must be the home of those
people we saw earlier.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Be welcome at the Temple of Fire,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text: Wait, so we are welcome here? Why the sudden change of heart? And what does 'Soul Voyager' mean?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
The Four Tribes of Cinq once had our lives
controlled by the Soul Temple. Eventually
we grew to despise its dominion over us,
and so banded together to destroy it.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
In the days when we were still under its sway,
travelers would occasionally appear. We named
them Soul Voyagers, for whatever they sought
would greatly affect the lives of all in Cinq.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
We know well the power of a Soul Voyager,
and humbly request your assistance in
defeating the Forestgale Alliance.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Look, we're happy to help those in need,
but we're not about to involve ourselves
in any local wars.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text: After the Soul Temple's destruction, the tribes of Cinq divided into two factions: the Flamewave League and the Forestgale Alliance. And while this conflict has not led to violence as yet, we remain in a state of perpetual opposition. This is why we must win.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
So please, Soul Voyager! Grant your
sacred aid to the Flamewave League!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Take whatever time you need.
We await your favorable reply.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
They wanted nothing to do with us earlier,
but now they seem very interested.
What do you think?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text: My intuition tells me there's a triangle in this for us regardless of who we choose to help—but we'll have to help someone in order to get it.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_010_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_010_C.text:
Is the Flame Temple also looking
for help from Soul Voyagers?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_010_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_010_C.text:
Ah, so you understand the situation already.
Yes, we of the Flamewave League do indeed
seek your aid, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text:
Thank you, Soul Voyager.
Now then, if I may be so bold as to
ask, we would appreciate your help.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_INTRO_000_C.text: What do you want us to do?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.text:
Be welcome at the Wave Temple,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.text: After the Soul Temple's destruction, the tribes of Cinq divided into two factions: the Waveflame League and the Forestgale Alliance. And while this conflict has not led to violence of yet, we remain in a state of perpetual opposition. This is why we must win.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_000_.text:
So please, Soul Voyager! Grant your
sacred aid to the Waveflame League!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_010_.text:
Is the Wave Temple also looking
for help from Soul Voyagers?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_010_.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_INTRO_010_.text:
Ah, so you understand the situation already.
Yes, we of the Waveflame League do indeed
seek your aid, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.text:
Be welcome at the Gale Temple,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.text:
We know well the power of a Soul Voyager,
and humbly request your assistance in
defeating the Flamewave League.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.text: After the Soul Temple's destruction, the tribes of Cinq divided into two factions: the Galeforest Alliance and the Flamewave League. And while this conflict has not led to violence as yet, we remain in a state of perpetual opposition. This is why we must win.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_000_C.text:
So please, Soul Voyager! Grant your
sacred aid to the Galeforest Alliance!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_010_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_010_C.text:
Is the Gale Temple also looking
for help from Soul Voyagers?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_010_C.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_INTRO_010_C.text:
Ah, so you understand the situation already.
Yes, we of the Galeforest Alliance do indeed
seek your aid, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.text:
Be welcome at the Forest Temple,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.text: After the Soul Temple's destruction, the tribes of Cinq divided into two factions: the Forestgale Alliance and the Flamewave League. And while this conflict has not led to violence as yet, we remain in a state of perpetual opposition. This is why we must win.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_000_.text:
So please, Soul Voyager! Grant your
sacred aid to the Forestgale Alliance!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_010_.text:
Is the Forest Temple also looking
for help from Soul Voyagers?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_010_.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_INTRO_010_.text:
Ah, so you understand the situation already.
Yes, we of the Forestgale Alliance do indeed
seek your aid, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We must boost our economic strength
if we hope to win this war. To this end,
we are creating factories one after another,
putting a strain on our energy supply.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
As our League has heat sources and water
in abundance, we use steam as our primary
means of generating power.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
And that's what you want
us to pitch in with?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The output of our steam plant is dropping.
Should the Soul Voyager stop by, I am sure
both the problem and its solution will be
made apparent.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Well, I'm no engineer, but I suppose
we can head over and take a look.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_000_00.text:
Good grief! This plant could power all
of Capitol City with capacity left over!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_000_01.text: Where are you going, little ghost?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_000_02.speaker: Nitram

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_000_03.text: I don't see the problem here.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_010_00.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_010_00.text:
I expected no less from you, Voyager!
Those fiends are sent by the Forestgale
Alliance, and perpetually cause damage
in this place. But today, the plant remains unharmed!
Sadly for the beasts, they cannot say the same.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_141_CUT_010_01.text:
I do not expect the Forestgale Alliance
to launch another attack any time soon,
so thank you again for your efforts.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
With the issue at the steam plant resolved,
our factories can now operate at full capacity.
However, we've realized our transportation
infrastructure cannot handle the output.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We need more harbors and ships. Furthermore,
our current lack of shipyards will surely lead
to additional problems down the road.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Well if there are two things we know nothing 
about, it's shipping and infrastructure planning—
so I'm not sure exactly what you're expecting
us to do here.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I'd like to ask you to visit a shipyard
construction site, where I feel certain
your presence will cause something
quite beneficial to transpire.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Okay, but WHAT do you expect to transpire?
Why can't you ever give a straight answer!?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_00.text:
Seems this is where they're
building the new shipyard.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_02.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_02.text:
Welcome, Voyager! Your arrival will
surely hasten the construction of
this important site!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_03.text: No idea why you assume that, but sure.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_04.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_04.text:
So I'm really just supposed to stand here
and watch? Ugh, I'm bored already.
Maybe I'll walk around a bit.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_05.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_05.text:
Well, everyone sure seems busy and—
Gya! Hey, don't push me!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_06.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_06.text:
How's that? You're worried about this box?
I suppose it does seem a bit suspicious.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_08.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_08.text:
Are you all right, Voyager!?
I heard an explosion!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_09.speaker: Formina_Franklyn

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_10.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_10.text:
This is clearly the work of the Forestgale
Alliance—one of their spies must have
infiltrated the site. I will begin a
thorough investigation at once!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_11.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_11.text:
How did you locate that bomb,
if you don't mind my asking?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_12.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_12.text:
I noticed it while I was walking around.
That's sort of my job, after all.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_13.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_000_13.text:
Well, regardless, your being here
was clearly a blessing. Thank you.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_010_00.text:
You were great today, little ghost.
It seems I've underestimated you.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_010_01.text:
If you keep getting in our way, Voyager,
I'm afraid I'll have to get rid of you.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_010_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_142_CUT_010_02.text:
Become a hero to one faction,
and you're a villain to another.
Isn't that always the way?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I'm given to understand that you foiled the
enemy's attempt to sabotage our new shipyard.
You Soul Voyagers truly are special beings!

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Construction of the shipyard is now complete,
offering a solution to our long-term shipping
problems. However, we would like to bring our
war with the Forestgale Alliance to a swifter end.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I couldn't agree more—which is why I urge you
to establish a neutral ground where you can
talk through your issues. But I'm guessing that
isn't what you're about to propose.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The backbone of the Forestgale Alliance's
economy is their system of railways.
Something must be done about it.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I'm not about to sabotage a bunch of trains,
if that's what you're asking.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
All we ask is that you visit a train
station of the Forestgale Alliance.
The rest will take care of itself.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_00.text:
So this is the train station, eh?
If this was destroyed, the damage to the
Forestgale Alliance would be significant.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_01.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, a Soul Voyager!
What are you doing here?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_02.text:
I think someone is trying to sabotage
this station, and I thought I could help
you prevent that from happening.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_03.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_03.text:
Somehow I doubt that's your true intention.
As such, we will take the liberty of assigning
an escort during your visit.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_04.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_04.text:
Hey, the more people watching, the better.
In fact, I'm pretty sure I know that guy
over there already.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_06.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_06.text:
So much for the big sabotage plot.
It seems nothing will happen here,
so it's time you were on your way.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_08.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_08.text:
Where the Voyager travels, calamity follows.
I am relieved to see that this instance
proved to be the exception to the—

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_10.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_10.text:
And we were too distracted with the Voyager
to see it coming! Damn you, Voyager!
You have brought ruin upon us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_11.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_11.text:
We weren't able to prevent the sabotage
of the station, but what's done is done.
Nothing to do here but move on.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_12.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_143_CUT_000_12.text:
Hee hee! Are you trying to cheer me up?
Aw, you're a sweet little thing.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our verdant forests supply the Alliance
with an ample amount of lumber.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Sadly, we have fallen far behind in
the task of processing said lumber;
we simply cannot afford to maintain
the necessary workforce.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Have you ever considered mechanizing
the process? There's only so much you
can achieve with manpower alone.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Indeed we have, which is why the tribes of gale
and forest have begun working together to construct
a mill. However, the project is beset with issues
that I am hoping you might resolve.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The peoples of gale and forest have begun
working together to construct a lumber mill.
However, the project is beset with issues
that I am hoping you might resolve.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Helping people resolve problems
is what we do best.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_00.text:
This is where they're building the mill,
but it sure doesn't look like they've
made much progress.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_02.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_02.text:
I am pleased to see you come, Voyager. Alas,
those of the Gale Tribe who are supposed to
be helping us construct the mill refuse to work. Might I ask you to scold them in my stead?
While they ignore me, they'll not so easily
shrug off a rebuke from a Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_03.text:
That's a common problem, isn't it?
Don't worry, we'll handle it.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_04.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_04.text:
The work is just too dangerous! These woods
are filled with all manner of horrid beasts,
and they're perpetually waiting for a chance
to make us their dinner! We tried telling the Forest Tribe that you can't
build a mill when you're always looking over
your shoulder, but they don't seem to care!
I simply don't understand their kind...

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_05.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_05.text:
That does sound rather frightening.
What if we scout out the forest for you?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_07.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_07.text:
To the Forest Tribe, beasts of the wood are
treasured neighbors with whom we coexist. And while we do eat them at times, our hunting
season is primarily for population control.
We cannot simply slaughter them indiscriminately
to ease the nerves of some cowardly wind people!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_08.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_08.text:
The creature I encountered in the woods
earlier was no beast, but a fiend.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_09.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_09.text: Hmm. We have sensed a disturbing decline in the beasts' numbers of late, so perhaps this is the reason. Which means... Of course! Those villains from the Flamewave League must be releasing fiends into our woods! Might I ask you to cull the numbers of these interlopers, Voyager?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_10.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_000_10.text:
I suppose I'd better—as much for
the beasts' sakes as for yours.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_010_00.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_010_00.text:
Now the Gale Tribe
can work without fear.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_231_CUT_010_01.text:
I can't believe the Flamewave League was behind
those monsters! They very nearly managed to
cause strife between us and the Forest Tribe,
and they will pay dearly for it!

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Thanks to the new mill, we'll be able to
finish some large-scale construction
projects that were on hold.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our next project is installing wind turbines in the
Gale Tribe's residential district. If we complete
that, the Alliance's energy production will finally
be comparable to that of the League.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: And what is it that you're about to ask of me?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Oh, I appreciate someone who doesn't beat
around the bush! The crux of it is this: we expect
the League to attempt to sabotage the project,
for there's no low their kind won't sink to.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our next project is installing wind turbines
in the Gale Tribe's residential district.
But we expect the League to attempt sabotage,
for there's no low their kind won't sink to.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Fiend extermination, then. Understood.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_00.text:
This is quite the large-scale project.
Turning wind into energy really is
an impressive innovation!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_01.text:
Yes, and the greater the project,
the harder it is to defend. We've already had a rash of suspicious fires
that destroyed precious materials recently
delivered from the mill. Without a doubt,
this is the work of the Flamewave League.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_02.text:
If it's a guard you need, I'm your lady;
nothing escapes my watchful eye.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_05.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_05.text:
These arsonists are trying something every
single night—but they'll soon learn not
to underestimate a cop's fortitude!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_06.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_06.text:
Thanks to you, our materials are safe,
and construction is proceeding smoothly.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_07.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_07.text:
Then I guess I won't have to
hold out for much longer.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_09.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_09.text: Fiend! A giant fiend is coming!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_10.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_000_10.text: Good! I was feeling a bit lazy.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_010_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_232_CUT_010_01.text:
What's that? You're praising me?
Aw, thanks, little ghost.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Various industries have been reaping the
benefit of the Alliance's new wind energy,
and our economic prospects seem bright.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Sadly, while we strive to live in greater
harmony with nature than the Flamewave League,
this has put us at a disadvantage in the war.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Even with our recent gains,
our loss is inevitable.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: And your point?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our only option would be to attack the enemy's
infrastructure. If we can destroy their port,
we will deal a great blow to their economy.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I'm not going to help you
commit a bunch of sabotage.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_00.text:
I can't help them, but I also can't turn
a blind eye to what they're planning.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_01.text: Guess you feel the same way, huh?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_02.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_02.text:
You have come, Voyager—
just as our intelligence predicted.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_03.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_03.text:
We know you are planning to destroy the port,
and I will not allow it! Your meddling will cause
no harm to the League today!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_04.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_04.text:
So THAT'S what this is about: they set me up
to be the decoy while they destroy the port!
Boy, I really walked right into that one...

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_05.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_233_CUT_000_05.text:
Cease your mumbling! Now then, tell me who sent you and
why you have come. I need to hear
a confession from your own lips.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Our long war is finally over!
The Flamewave League stands victorious!

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Our League has proven its dominance
thanks to the Soul Voyager!

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Should your travels bring you to this
world again, please do visit our temple.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
This is the end, and we never found
the triangle. I suppose it could be
somewhere we haven't visited yet?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text: Do you have any ideas, Bonnie?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
I reckon maybe we need to see this conflict
through until there's only one temple left.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
But the conflict is already over.
Won't this world be at peace now?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Heck, that alliance between Flame and
Wave is thin as an old sheet on the line!
At the end of the day, only one team
ever gets to win a war.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Is that really how this works? It's not like
the tribes of Forest or Gale did anything
to justify their fate; do I have to aid in the
torment of even more people now?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Darlin', that's just how missions go sometimes.
We're here to gather the triangles and solve
the mystery of Quisstatium, and that's it. Our duty's to protect the Union States,
not these tribes.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text:
Listen, I'd be happy to handle
the dirty work if you like.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_FWWIN_000_.text: No, it's all right. I can do it.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
Our long war is finally over!
The Forestgale Alliance stands victorious!

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
Our Alliance has proven its dominance
thanks to the Soul Voyager!

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
Should your travels bring you to this
world again, please do visit our temple.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
They've achieved their aims,
but we still don't have any
idea as to what YOUR goal is.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
Can you at least tell us where
we can find a triangle?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
The whole purpose of the Forestgale Alliance
was so they could resist the Flamewave League.
Without a common enemy, their alliance ain't
got a reason to be no more.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_SWITCHPHASE_WWWIN_000_.text:
Is that really how this works? It's not like
the tribes of Flame or Wave did anything
to justify their fate; do I have to aid in the
torment of even more people now?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
I hope the Flamewave League
is holding strong.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
You have come at an opportune time,
Soul Voyager!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
Why do I feel like my worst fears
are about to be confirmed?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
Your worst fears? Yes, we have been feeling much
the same—in fact, we now suspect the Wave Tribe
intends to attack us! Therefore, we must make a
proactive move, lest we yield the initiative.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
But the alliance between the Flame and
Wave Tribes was a wonderful thing!
Why would you abandon that now?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
As much as I wish it could have continued,
the Wave Temple sees things differently,
and has decreed our people can never be one.
Knowing this, I ask you to aid us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
Take whatever time you need.
We await your favorable reply.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
I guess Bonnie was right:
only one team can win in the end.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_00.text:
Well, if that's how it has to be, then the
best way for us to help is to bring this war
to the quickest possible resolution.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_01.text:
Just as I suspected. It's the same things
I heard over at the Flame Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_01.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_BETRAYAL_01.text:
We are resolved to launch an attack
on the Wave Tribe, Voyager, and would
much appreciate your aid.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
Your worst fears? Yes, we have been feeling much
the same—in fact, we now suspect the Flame Tribe
intends to attack us! Therefore, we must make a
proactive move, lest we yield the initiative.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
But the alliance between the Wave and
Flame Tribes was a wonderful thing!
Why would you abandon that now?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
As much as I wish it could have continued,
the Flame Temple sees things differently,
and has decreed our people can never be one.
Knowing this, I ask you to aid us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
Just as I suspected. It's the same things
I heard over at the Wave Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_BETRAYAL_0.text:
We are resolved to launch an attack
on the Flame Tribe, Voyager, and would
much appreciate your aid.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.text:
I wonder how the Forestgale
Alliance is holding up?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.text:
Your worst fears? Yes, we have been feeling much
the same—in fact, we now suspect the Forest Tribe
intends to attack us! Therefore, we must make a
proactive move, lest we yield the initiative.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.text:
But the alliance between the Gale and
Forest Tribes was a wonderful thing!
Why would you abandon that now?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_00.text:
As much as I wish it could have continued,
the Forest Temple sees things differently,
and claims the forest has no need of wind.
Knowing this, I ask you to aid us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_01.text:
Just as I suspected. It's the same things
I heard over at the Gale Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_01.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_BETRAYAL_01.text:
We are resolved to launch an attack
on the Forest Tribe, Voyager, and would
much appreciate your aid.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
Your worst fears? Yes, we have been feeling much
the same—in fact, we now suspect the Gale Tribe
intends to attack us! Therefore, we must make a
proactive move, lest we yield the initiative.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
But the alliance between the Forest and
Gale Tribes was a wonderful thing!
Why would you abandon that now?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
As much as I wish it could have continued,
the Gale Temple sees things differently,
and declared the woods an obstacle to wind.
Knowing this, I ask you to aid us!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
Just as I suspected. It's the same things
I heard over at the Forest Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOODS_BETRAYAL_0.text:
We are resolved to launch an attack
on the Gale Tribe, Voyager, and would
much appreciate your aid.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We were able to claim victory in our war
against the Forestgale Alliance due to our
superior energy production.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Does that mean you're going to
build another steam plant?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
No. That would take far too long, causing
us to fall behind in the war against the
wave people. Instead, we seek to upgrade
our current plant.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Huh. Sadly, that sort of technical work
is a bit out of my wheelhouse.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I ask only that you visit the plant.
That should ensure all goes smoothly.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Again with the impossibly
vague explanations.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_000_00.text:
The energy from this plant also goes
to the Wave Tribe, right? So why can't
you two just continue to cooperate?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_000_01.text:
Because their incessant harassment
has completely stalled our plans
to upgrade the power plant!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_000_03.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_000_03.text:
They loose fiends near the cooling pools,
which both endangers our staff and reduces
the plant's efficiency.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_000_04.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_000_04.text:
Well, if there are fiends that need slaying,
I can definitely help; I was just thinking
I could use a nice stretch.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_010_00.text:
I understand how these fiends could cause
trouble for your people, but if the Wave Tribe
was serious about harming you, they would have
sent something a whole lot worse.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_101_CUT_010_01.text:
While you have my gratitude, Voyager,
you know little of the Wave Tribe.
They are indeed set on annihilating
our kind!

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We wish to make use of various minerals
which can be obtained from volcanoes.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
And you'll melt those ores
with the volcano's heat?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: You are rather ignorant about our technology, Voyager. We are only securing the minerals from the volcano; we will later smelt them using the heat from our steam plant.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: So what are you making, exactly?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We will use that energy to power our forges,
which will allow us to craft ever more potent
weapons and lead us to a great victory!

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We will use that energy to power our forges,
which will allow us to craft ever more potent
weapons and lead us to a great victory!

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Is warfare the only option that's
even on the table here?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_000_01.text:
What you are feeling is the heat from the
volcano mingling with our fiery enthusiasm
for these ironworks.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_000_02.text:
I certainly wouldn't want to
stick around here very long.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_000_03.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_000_03.text:
The fire fiends here don't like our presence.
And while we're not afraid of their attacks,
per se, we also haven't figured out an
effective strategy to combat them.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_000_04.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_000_04.text:
Let's get this over with
as quickly as we can.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_010_00.text:
The heat was no joke,
but I managed to get the job done.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_102_CUT_010_01.text:
Thank you! Now we can finish the
ironworks without further incident.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We have arrived at a decision, Voyager:
we are going to destroy the shipyard
that once stood as a proud symbol
of the Flamewave League's unity.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Is that really necessary?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The psychological damage it will deal
to the Wave Tribe is the best way to
ensure a rapid victory against them.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Well, this is between the two of you,
so do what you will—but I'm not going
to be a party to any of this.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We will win this war with or without
your assistance, Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_000_00.text:
This is really sad. If only you two could
have trusted each other, you might have
taken a very different path.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_000_01.text:
I understand how you must feel, Voyager,
seeing as you once risked your life in defense
of the shipyard. But there is no other choice
left to us.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_000_02.text: It wasn't me who saved the shipyard. Are you okay with this?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_010_00.text:
All that time and effort to build it,
and only an instant to destroy it.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_010_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_103_CUT_010_01.text:
Well, I guess this is the end of it.
I should find the triangle and go home.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
We have destroyed all the enemy
temples thanks to your good work.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
I didn't destroy a damn thing,
but I guess I'm glad you're satisfied.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
Indeed. Now that only the Flame Temple remains,
we can finally cover the entirety of Cinq with magma.
Then only we will remain!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
You have served us well, Soul Voyager,
and I wish to grant you tribute.
What is it you desire?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
We're searching for a special triangle
that should be inside your temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: FirePriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
You'll find no such thing within our own temple,
nor in any of the temples that were destroyed.
Sadly, I'm afraid I will not be able to fulfill this
request of yours.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh no... Did we choose the
wrong temple to save?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_100_CUT_000_0.text:
There must be something we overlooked.
Isn't that right, little ghost?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our transportation infrastructure gives us an
advantage over the Flame Tribe, for we can move
more on our waterways than on any land route—
so long as we have the ships, that is.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Are you going to build a new shipyard?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
No. That would take far too long, causing
us to fall behind in the war against the
Flame Tribe. Instead, we seek to upgrade
our current one.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Fair enough—but that sort of
technical work isn't my thing.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I ask only that you visit the shipyard.
That should ensure all goes smoothly.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Again with the impossibly
vague explanations.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_00.text:
What an impressive shipyard! Sort of
hard to believe it wouldn't be here
if you didn't find that bomb.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_01.text:
I hear you want to upgrade the shipyard.
Is there something stopping you?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_02.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_02.text:
While our shipyard is capable of producing
large-scale vessels, its facilities are
lacking due to its hasty construction
in the midst of the war. And since building large vessels is an
inefficient process at the best of times,
we must see this situation rectified.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_03.text:
That doesn't sound like the sort of
problem I can help with; I don't know
the first thing about ships.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_04.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_000_04.text: Ha ha! We certainly do not expect your help with that, Voyager. We have specialists in that field arriving any min—

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_010_00.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_010_00.text:
You truly have a knack for being where
you are needed most, Voyager.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_010_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_401_CUT_010_01.text: I'm a cop. It's what we do.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our waterways are now so crowded that
we fear the possibility of a collision.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Well, that certainly sounds like a problem.
Do you have a solution in mind?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We intend to construct a lighthouse
and highlight safe shipping routes.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Good idea! If anything goes wrong,
don't hesitate to let me know.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Actually, I would prefer
that you go see it now.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I would like you to visit the
lighthouse construction site.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
So something's gone wrong ALREADY?
You could have just said so!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_00.text:
Wait, is this where they're building
the lighthouse? It looks like they've
barely started working on it.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_01.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_01.text:
Yet had you waited, there would be no
lighthouse to see, for fiends are currently
preventing us from building it.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_02.text:
And you believe the Flame Temple
sent the fiends here?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_03.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_03.text:
No, in fact—these appear to be native
creatures who simply don't appreciate
what we're doing in their territory.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_04.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_000_04.text: Now THIS is a problem I can solve!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_010_00.text: Will this torrent of fiends ever end?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_010_01.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_010_01.text:
The fiends should calm down once
construction is finished and we
vacate the area.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_010_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_402_CUT_010_02.text:
Sounds like that's not
happening anytime soon.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We have arrived at a decision, Voyager:
we are going to destroy the steam plant
that once stood as a proud symbol of
the Waveflame League's unity.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Okay, but won't that hurt
the Wave Tribe as well?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Yes, but it is still the best way to ensure
a rapid victory against the Flame Tribe.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
So we've reached the stage of war where
you're sacrificing your own. Fantastic.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: No one asked for your opinion.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_00.text: How do you intend to stop this?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_01.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_01.text:
If the pressure of the steam exceeds
a certain level, the plant will explode.
Accidents do happen, after all.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_02.text:
An accident that only the Wave Tribe
knows about in advance.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_03.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_03.text:
Everyone knows about the potential for
accidents. If this one causes excessive
damage, it will be on the Flame Tribe for
not taking proper precautions.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_04.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_403_CUT_000_04.text:
That's hardly a justification
when you're the one causing it!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.text:
As the Wave Tribe cannot survive for long in
the open air, we have no intentions of stealing
the lands of others. All we desire is for all to
live in peace within their own territories.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.text:
How can you speak of peace when you
destroyed the temples of the other tribes?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.speaker: WaterPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_400_CUT_000_0.text:
Because they looked to conquer US! Sadly,
the peace we sought could only be secured
through the destruction of all other temples.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We must increase our energy capacity without
attracting attention from the Forest Tribe.
To this end, we seek to upgrade our output
of wind energy.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
So you'll be performing upgrades and
masking them as routine maintenance?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Yes, exactly so! Ah, but it is a relief
to have your keen insight on our side,
Soul Voyager.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
And I imagine you're concerned that
the Forest Tribe will catch on.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Indeed I am. In fact, the Forest Tribe are
certain to come investigate our dealings,
and I am at a loss for how to deter them.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Might I ask you to visit the wind farm?
I have no desire to risk trouble between
our peoples at this point.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
If it will help prevent conflict,
I'll do whatever I can.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_00.text:
I see lots of the Forest Tribe here.
They must watching over the wind farm.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_01.text:
It will be impossible to replace the
components necessary to boost our output
with so many people watching, Voyager.
What is to be done?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_02.text:
Well, I suppose you could drive a few
nearby fiends toward the wind farm.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_03.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_03.text:
An interesting thought... Yet while the
Forest Tribe would certainly pay us little
mind during a fiend attack, it would also
place our workers in grave danger.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_04.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_000_04.text:
Leave that to us; I promise that none
of your people will be harmed.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_010_00.text:
I told you to drive in a few fiends,
not an entire herd!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_301_CUT_010_01.text:
We may have gotten carried away a bit,
and for this, I apologize. But surely
they were no more than a minor
inconvenience for you, Voyager?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
As there has been no change to the Forest
Tribe's supply of energy, they currently
suspect nothing. We must use this chance
to strengthen our own position.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Such as making weapons?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We intend to take measures such as increasing
food production in order to become fully self-
sufficient. In this way, we can continue the
war even after the forest people cut off trade.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
That...actually seems like a good idea.
Is there anything we can do to help?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
WindPriest
Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
From industry to agriculture...
The life of a Soul Voyager
certainly is a busy one.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_000_00.text:
When you mentioned a farm, I pictured fields
of crops and the like, but this is mostly barns.
When this place is complete, you'll be able to
raise an incredible amount of livestock here!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_000_01.text:
With our wind power, even a small amount of
people can raise a large amount of livestock.
These will be used not only for consumption,
but for trade with other regions as well.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_000_02.text:
Impressive. So what do you
need my help with here?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_000_03.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_000_03.text:
Barns are of little use with no livestock to
fill them—but before we can gather our herds
from the pastures, we must deal with the
various fiends in the area.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_010_00.text: All right, the rest is in your hands.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_010_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_010_01.text:
Thank you, Voyager! Without your help,
we would be up for a severe tongue-lashing
from our leaders at the temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_010_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_302_CUT_010_02.text: Boy, does that ever sound familiar...

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The Forest Tribe are completely oblivious,
and one small push may be all it takes to
win their surrender. As such, I intend to
attack their lumber mill.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I suppose a surprise attack is a good
way to limit your own casualties.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
In fact, it is the best way to minimize
casualties on BOTH sides, and therefore
the optimal strategy.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
If you're so concerned about casualties,
you might want to consider a strategy
called 'Not Going To War At All.'

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
No one is asking you to participate
in the attack, Soul Voyager!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_303_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_303_CUT_000_00.text:
It seems like only yesterday that the Gale and
Forest Tribes worked hand-in-hand to build this
lumber mill—but perhaps it was never quite
the show of unity it appeared to be.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_303_CUT_000_01.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_303_CUT_000_01.text:
We worked ourselves near to death in this forest,
yet the Forest Tribe never made any effort to
understand our ways. For us, this place holds
naught but painful memories.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.text:
Now we can finally raze this terrible forest!
We will turn it from a terrifying den of beasts
into a peaceful grassland savanna—for one cannot
live on lava and water, nor grow crops there.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.text: You don't see the issue in razing trees just because you don't need them?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.speaker: WindPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_300_CUT_000_0.text:
There will still be trees, Voyager—there is
simply no need for such dense forestland.
All that matters is the wind blowing through
the new grassy plains.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
How are we to defend ourselves from an assault by
the Gale Tribe? Alas, while we of the Forest Tribe
cannot match their strength, we've no choice but
to throw away our lives in the effort.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Why not open a dialogue with them?
Communication is the first step to
conflict resolution; military force
should always be the very last resort.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Yes, we will definitely try that...
and afterward, we will optimize the
lumber mill! That is our only hope.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: I'm happy to help if I can.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I would appreciate you going to the mill,
for I know your presence will bring
great cheer to all the workers.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
I would appreciate you going to the mill,
for I know your presence will bring
great cheer to all the workers.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_00.text:
Lots of Forest Tribe members are gathered
around the mill. What are they doing?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_01.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_01.text:
We laid off laborers who will no longer be
needed due to the mill upgrades, and now
they're interfering with the process! We even offered to find them new jobs,
but they refuse to listen.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_02.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_02.text:
We may have to take stronger
measures to remove them.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_03.text:
I get the sense a lot of people are
refusing to listen around here—which
doesn't exactly bode well for the future.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_04.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_000_04.text:
Look out! Some of the fiends the
Flamewave League sent are still alive!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_010_00.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_010_00.text:
With the former workers scattered,
we can now upgrade the mill.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_010_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_201_CUT_010_01.text: Were those fiends really just leftovers from the former Flamewave League? Seems suspicious to me.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Our talks with the Gale Tribe did nothing
but heighten suspicions. We should never
have engaged with them at all.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
You can't expect to achieve mutual
understanding in a single session.
You have let the process play out.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
Patience is a luxury we do not have. Instead,
we formed a cavalry composed of workers made
redundant by the mill upgrade, which will allow
us to match the speed of the Gale Tribe's forces.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Which means you need stables, right?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
You guess correctly. As such, we would ask
you to visit the construction site, as we
anticipate interference from the Gale Tribe.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
We would ask you to visit the construction
site of the stables, as we anticipate
interference from the Gale Tribe.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
If both sides feel this way,
maybe dialogue really is pointless.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_000_00.text:
I know what the Forest Tribe said,
but could they simply be paranoid?
I mean, the Gale Tribe DID agree
to hold talks, after all.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_000_01.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_000_01.text:
The wind blows in a strange direction today... 
I wonder if the Gale Tribe is using it
to send some fell beast after us.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_000_02.text: The heck you talkin' about, guy?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_010_00.text:
I see no evidence that the Gale Tribe
is responsible for the fiend attack.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_010_01.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_010_01.text: Is that truly what you believe?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_010_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_202_CUT_010_02.text: I believe you want to think they're responsible. How's that?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The Gale Tribe derives its strength
from the energy of their wind farm.
Without it, they are powerless.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text: Don't tell me you intend to destroy it.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
The Gale Tribe uses their mastery of the breezes
to send countless fiends after us. We have no
option but to destroy the farm—although I do not
know if we actually possess the power to do so.

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
But don't you rely on wind energy
just as much as they do?

SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_FUNC_BOFO_MISSIONCONFIRMATION_TE.text:
That is of no concern. So long as we
have our forests, we can survive.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_203_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_203_CUT_000_00.text:
So much work went into constructing this!
Doesn't that mean anything to anyone?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_203_CUT_000_01.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_MISSION_203_CUT_000_01.text:
We will set the wind farm to burn.
If we are slain in the effort,
I leave the fate of the Forest Tribe
in your hands, Voyager. Farewell.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.text:
The strength of the Gale Temple has been
reduced to nothing, and we can now live
lives free of worry. All praise to the forests, for they will
now spread unchecked across all of Cinq,
realizing our dream of a green world!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.text:
That doesn't sound so bad—though the other
people of Cinq may feel differently.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: WoodsPriest
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_200_CUT_000_0.text:
The other peoples do not yet know the worth
of the forest. Once they see how wonderful
it is to make one's home among the canopy
of trees, they will come to see things our way.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.text:
Your journey here is not yet over.
Can't you see there is more to be done?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.text:
Is your goal just to see everything
here in ruins, feller?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_000_0.text:
I guess the little ghost isn't after
trick-or-treat candy after all.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.text:
So now we are to tear down this temple with
our own hands? As much as I want a triangle,
this feels like a bridge too far.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.text:
I'm with you on that, hon—and I sure
don't feel good about bein' manipulated
by that little creep.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.text:
We have come to destroy the temple.
Do not interfere.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.text: We take our fate into our own hands.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.text:
None of our tribes wish to be ruled
by the temple in this fashion.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.text: Is this because of what we did?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEFIRE_LAST_CUT_00.text:
Nope! The folks in this here world
achieved this with their own power.
They went and won their future.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_LAST_CUT_0.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_LAST_CUT_0.text:
We have come to destroy that temple.
Do not interfere.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_LAST_CUT_0.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_LAST_CUT_0.text: We take our fate into our own hands.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_LAST_CUT_0.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWATER_LAST_CUT_0.text:
None of our tribes wish to be ruled
by the temple in this fashion.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_LAST_CUT_00.text:
We have come to destroy that temple.
Do not interfere.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_LAST_CUT_00.text: We take our fate into our own hands.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWIND_LAST_CUT_00.text:
None of our tribes wish to be ruled
by the temple in this fashion.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOOD_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOOD_LAST_CUT_00.text:
We have come to destroy that temple.
Do not interfere.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOOD_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOOD_LAST_CUT_00.text: We take our fate into our own hands.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOOD_LAST_CUT_00.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLEWOOD_LAST_CUT_00.text:
None of our tribes wish to be ruled
by the temple in this fashion.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
All the temples have been destroyed.
What will become of this world now?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
All has been returned to the point from
which it began. The Four Tribes will now
begin anew—and will continue to do so
as many times as it takes.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Nitram
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Let's stack these stones
at the Soul Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Atihana
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
If we all work together,
we can rebuild the Soul Temple.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Nahoj
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
All those of the Four Tribes
possess a soul.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Irbas
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text: May all our souls be as one.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Everyone looks so satisfied; they clearly
think they're taking their futures into
their own hands.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
But if all of this is engineered
to work out this way...

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Nossir, I can't watch this no more.
We did what we were supposed to,
so make with the triangle already!

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Quisstatium watches over the worlds.
Quisstatium watches over you.

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Hear me now, O Soul Voyagers.
Who do you choose to take with you?

SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W07_EVAR_BOFO_GAMEOVER_110_CUT_010_1.text:
I hope you're all able to achieve
true freedom one day.
